Function reference

Tags

tags-index-crossref @aliases @backref @concept @family @keywords @references @seealso
Tags for indexing and cross-references
tags-namespace @evalNamespace @export @exportClass @exportMethod @exportPattern @exportS3Method @import @importClassesFrom @importFrom @importMethodsFrom @rawNamespace @useDynLib
Tags for managing the NAMESPACE
tags-rd-formatting @md @noMd @section
Tags related to markdown support
tags-rd-other @field @format @method @slot @source
Tags for documenting datasets and classes
tags-rd @description @details @example @examples @examplesIf @noRd @param @rawRd @return @returns @title @usage
Tags for documenting functions
tags-reuse @describeIn @eval @evalRd @includeRmd @inherit @inheritDotParams @inheritParams @inheritSection @order @rdname @template @templateVar
Tags that help you reuse documentation

Running roxygen2

roxygenize() roxygenise()
Process a package with the Rd, namespace and collate roclets
update_collate()
Update Collate field in DESCRIPTION
load_pkgload() load_installed() load_source()
Load package code

Roclets

namespace_roclet()
Roclet: make NAMESPACE
rd_roclet()
Roclet: make Rd files
